segments.text: I glance into this cozy kitchen and see a woman busily drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron, looking so focused on that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, the sink is overflowing right in front of her!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring over the edge, making a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in it, but she doesn't seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over to the side, there's a boy climbing on a little stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching up into the open cabinet for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at him, sneaky little guy grabbing those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him has her hand out, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks shaky, though; he might tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden looks so peaceful and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how calm everything seems out there compared to this mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
